name: Rikochet: Laser Splitter
description:
Welcome to our game,

This is a puzzle game where your goal is to shoot the targets with the least amount of shooting/ammo as possible.  Each level is beatable using only one shot

How to Play:  Left click the screen to shoot and click buttons

Let us know if this is a game we should work more on,

Thank you, enjoy our game!

Made for TriJam#197: Theme Split Up (3hour game jam)
